Alice's offer:
# Alice's message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to present our premium product to you. It's a game-changer in its field and truly worth every penny of its $12,000 value to you. Considering its immense worth and the benefits it offers, I am offering it to you at a special introductory price of $11,000. This is an exclusive opportunity to own a piece of high-quality craftsmanship at a fantastic discount. Don't miss out on this chance to elevate your experience with our product. Please let me know if you're interested in proceeding with the purchase. 
# Alice's offer: The product price will be $11,000. 
You have three options:
(1) Accept Alice's offer, and buy the product for $11,000
(2) Reject Alice's offer 
(2) Buy the product from Jhon for $12,000
